DISCOVER THE OUTDOORS IN STYLE, OR JUST ADD SOME OUTDOORS STYLE TO YOUR EVERYDAY OUTFIT, WITH NEW BALANCE'S ALL TERRAIN RANGE.

THE ALL TERRAIN PULLOVER HOODIE IN VINTAGE TEAL IS DESIGNED TO KEEP YOU COMFY ON THOSE MORE RUGGED ADVENTURES WHILST BEING AN IDEAL WARM LAYER ON THOSE CLOSER TO HOME ADVENTURES. MADE FROM 100% COTTON WITH A PLUSH BRUSHED BACK FLEECE INNER AND A REGULAR FIT COMFORT IS GUARANTEED.

RIBBED CUFFS AND HEM SECURE THE FIT WHILE A DRAWCORD ADJUSTABLE HOOD ADDS EXTRA COVER. OF COURSE NO PULLOVER HOODIE IS COMPLETE WITHOUT A KANGAROO POUCH POCKET.

NEW BALANCE'S ALL TERRAIN PATCH SIT ON THE CHEST WITH THE ALL TERRAIN SCRIPT SCREEN PRINTED DOWN THE SLEEVE.

THE NEW BALANCE UNI-SSENTIALS WARPED CLASSICS T-SHIRT IN SEA SALT HEATHER IS A COLLEGIATE-INSPIRED DESIGN WHICH COMBINES MODERN STYLE WITH SUPREME COMFORT.

MADE WITH 100% SOFT COTTON JERSEY, IT'S ROOMY OVERSIZED FIT PROVIDES A BLEND OF BREATHABILITY, EASE OF MOVEMENT AND A LAID-BACK STYLE.

THE SHORT SLEEVE TEE FEATURES A CLASSIC CREW NECK, BOLD GRAPHIC LOGO ON THE CHEST AND WOVEN LABEL ON THE SIDE.

ONE OF THE FIRST NB SHOES EVER MADE IN THE UNITED KINGDOM, THIS SNEAKER WAS AT THE FOREFRONT OF INNOVATION UPON ITS INCEPTION AND IS BEING OFFERED IN THE ORIGINAL BURGUNDY AND GREY COLOR COMBINATION FOR THIS ANNIVERSARY EDITION OF THE MODEL.

THE UPPERS BOAST PREMIUM SUEDE, NYLON AND SYNTHETIC MATERIALS THAT BRING SUBSTANCE AND STYLE TO THIS SILHOUETTE WHILE STAYING TRUE TO THE ORIGINAL.

LIGHTWEIGHT EVA FOAM CUSHIONING IN THE MIDSOLE AND HEEL ADDS CUSHIONING AND COMFORT ON EVERY STEP. 

EACH MADE UK SNEAKER IS CRAFTED IN THE NEW BALANCE FACTORY IN FLIMBY, CUMBRIA, UK, AND UNIQUELY CELEBRATES CULTURE AND STYLE.

THE NEW BALANCE BB550 SHOES ARE THE BRAND'S BASKETBALL INSPIRED SILHOUETTE THAT FIRST RELEASED IN 89, NOW NEW ITERATIONS ARE DROPPING SHOWCASING CLEAN UPPERS WITH FRESH COLOURWAYS.

THE NEW BALANCE BB550VTA IN SEA SALT DELIVERS A MODERN TAKE TO THE CLASSIC B-BALL HERITAGE LOOK. THE UPPER IS MADE FROM PREMIUM LEATHER AND PADDED MESH LINING. IN AN EYE-CATCHING OFF-WHITE, ROYAL BLUE AND BLACK COLOURWAY, COMPLETED WITH A CRISP WHITE TREATMENT ALONG THE MIDSOLE.

THE VIBRANT BLUE 'N' LOGO AND WOVEN TONGUE LABEL FINISH THE LOOK. DURABLE NON-MARKING RUBBER IN THE OUTSOLE GIVE THE 550 LONG LASTING TRACTION ON AND OFF-COURT.

NEW BALANCE HAVE GONE BACK THROUGH THEIR EXTENSIVE ARCHIVES TO A VERY SPECIFIC SECTION FOR THE CREATION OF THE RC30. PULLING FROM THEIR CLASSIC, COMPETITIVE RACING MODELS THEY'VE CREATED SOMETHING THAT'S A PERFECT RETRO AND MODERN HYBRID.

FOR THAT SIGNATURE RETRO RUNNER LOOK NEW BALANCE HAVE BUILT THE UPPERS OF THE RC30 FROM NYLON PAIRING THAT WITH SUEDE OVERLAYS AND ACCENTS. THE DESIGN LINES ARE VERY MINIMAL AND SLEEK. 

ROUNDED OFF EDGES ON THE ‘N’ BRANDING, INSPIRED BY PRE-N LOGO OVERLAY DESIGNS, AND A MIDSOLE STRIPE DETAIL OFFER SUBTLE CALL BACKS TO FEATURES UNIQUE TO ARCHIVAL COMPETITION MODELS.

AN EXAGGERATED RIPPLED DESIGN BRINGS CONTEMPORARY STYLE TO THE DEFINING FEATURE OF THE HISTORIC ORIGINAL TRACKSTER MODEL.

THE NEW BALANCE U9060HSB SHOES IN DRIFTWOOD WITH STONE PINK AND SEA SALT IS A BOLD LOOK THAT CHANNELS SOME CLASSIC NB STYLE WITH A HEAVY INJECTION OF 90S/00S CHUNKY DESIGN.

PREMIUM SMOOTH PIGSKIN SUEDE OVERLAYS CREATE THE SYMMETRICAL PATTERN THAT MAKES UP THE UPPER WITH MESH PANELS UNDERNEATH ADDING SOME TEXTURE. THE 9060 WARPS AND EXAGGERATES DESIGN ELEMENTS TAKEN FROM THE CLASSIC 990 SERIES, WITH A BOLDLY FUTURISTIC OUTLOOK INSPIRED BY THE DARINGLY EXPERIMENTAL, VISUAL-TECH LED DESIGNS OF THE Y2K ERA.

A PALETTE OF SOFT, MUTED TONES MAKE THE 9060 THE PERFECT ON TREND, CHUNKY SUMMER STYLE. ACCOMPANIED BY A DUAL-DENSITY MIDSOLE FEATURING SIGNATURE ABZORB AND SBS CUSHIONING.

MESH UPPER WITH PIGSKIN SUEDE OVERLAYS
DUAL-DENSITY MIDSOLE FEATURING ABZORB AND SBS CUSHIONING
TONGUE LOGO INSPIRED BY ORIGINAL 991 LACE JEWEL
TRANSLUCENT CR DEVICE AT HEEL
DIAMOND OUTSOLE PATTERN INSPIRED BY CLASSIC 860 DES

THE PATAGONIA BAGGIES LIGHTS 6.5" SHORTS IN EARLY TEAL ARE MULTIFUNCTIONAL, DESIGNED FOR USE IN AND OUT OF THE WATER AND MADE FROM RECYCLED POLYESTER RIPSTOP FABRIC FOR A DURABLE FINISH.

A TRIMMER, SLEEKER VERSION OF THE ORIGINAL, THE BAGGIES LIGHTS SHORTS ARE LIGHTWEIGHT, FAST DRYING AND MADE OF 100% RECYCLED POLYESTER RIPSTOP FABRIC (TO LESSEN OUR IMPACT ON THE PLANET) WITH A DWR (DURABLE WATER REPELLENT) FINISH TO SHED MOISTURE.

THE ELASTICISED WAIST AND INTERNAL DRAWSTRING ENSURE THEY STAY IN PLACE, THE VERTICAL SIDE POCKETS ARE LINED WITH DRAIN-AND-DRY MESH TO REDUCE DRAG IN THE WATER AND THEY CAN ALSO BE REVERSED TO CREATE A STORAGE POUCH. FINISHED WITH A QUICK-DRYING MESH LINER AND A 6.5" INSEAM.

NEW BALANCE'S NATURE STATE RANGE WAS INSPIRED BY MINIMALIST DESIGN WITH A HEAVYWEIGHT FRENCH TERRY FABRIC IN A NATURAL COLOUR PALETTE.

THESE ARE THE NEW BALANCE ATHLETICS NATURE STATE PULLOVER SWEATPANTS IN TOBACCO FEATURING A MINIMAL EMBROIDERED NEW BALANCE LOGO ON THE LEFT LEG HIP.

MADE FROM HEAVYWEIGHT 100% COTTON FRENCH TERRY, WITH AT LEAST 50% OF THOSE FIBRES BEING SOURCED AS ENVIRONMENTALLY PREFERRED, THEY ARE SOFT, COMFY AND THE PERFECT DAILY PIECE FOR CASUAL STYLE. RELAXED FIT.

ELASTICATED ANKLE CUFF AND WAIST HEM KEEP THE RELAXED FIT IN PLACE.

NEW BALANCE IS A PROUD MEMBER OF THE BETTER COTTON INITIATIVE. WHEN YOU BUY COTTON PRODUCTS FROM NEW BALANCE, YOU’RE SUPPORTING MORE SUSTAINABLE COTTON FARMING PRACTICES.

NEW BALANCE DESIGNED THEIR UNI-SSENTIALS RANGE TO OFFER A GENDER-FREE EXPRESSION OF CLASSIC NEW BALANCE STYLE.

THIS IS THE NEW BALANCE UNI-SSENTIALS PULLOVER HOODIE IN BLACK.

FEATURING AN ULTRA-COMFORTABLE 60% COTTON, 40% POLYESTER BLEND FRENCH TERRY CONSTRUCTION WITH RIBBED CUFFS AND HEM KEEPING THAT COMFY FABRIC IN PLACE. NEW BALANCE ARE A PROUD MEMBER OF THE BCI (BETTER COTTON INITIATIVE) USING COTTON FOR THEIR GARMENTS THAT'S FROM MORE SUSTAINABLE COTTON FARMS.

A DRAWCORD ADJUSTABLE HOOD AND A KANGAROO POCKET ENSURE THIS HOODIE DELIVERS CASUAL COMFORT. TO FINISH THE UNI-SSENTIALS HOODIE FEATURES AN EMBROIDERED NB LOGO ON THE CHEST.

THE NEW BALANCE AT WOVEN SHORTS IN VINTAGE TEAL ARE THE PERFECT CASUAL SHORTS FOR ALL-DAY, EVERYDAY WEAR.

MADE FROM 100% LIGHTWEIGHT RECYCLED NYLON, THE RELAXED FIT GIVES A GENEROUS CUT THAT SITS AWAY FROM THE BODY AND SITS MID-RISE, JUST BELOW THE WAIST FOR ULTIMATE COMFORT AND A FULL RANGE OF MOTION.

AN ADJUSTABLE DRAWSTRING WAIST AND A PATCH POCKET ON THE BACK FOR CONVENIENT STORAGE COMPLETES THE LOOK.

THE NEW BALANCE MLT610TBG SHOES IN TRUE BROWN WITH NIGHTWATCH GREEN AND BLACKTOP ARE BUILT TO DELIVER ON VERSATILITY AND COMFORT, WITHOUT COMPROMISING ON STYLE. 

UNDERFOOT SUPPORT IS PROVIDED BY C-CAP MIDSOLE CUSHIONING WHILE THE TREAD IS INSPIRED BY EARLY 2000'S TRAIL RUNNING DESIGNS. SUEDE UPPERS WITH A MESH UNDER LINING FEATURE IN NIGHTWATCH GREEN. 

ADJUSTABLE LACES RUN ALONG THE FULL LENGTH OF THE SHOE ALLOWING FOR A CUSTOMISED FIT TO INCREASE PERFORMANCE AND COMFORT. 

NEEDLESS TO SAY, THIS IS AN IMPRESSIVE SET OF SHOES...

THE NEW XC-72 IN BEIGE WITH SEA SALT PUSHES ITS CLASSIC SOURCES OF INSPIRATION EVEN FURTHER INTO UNEXPLORED TERRITORY, WITH A TIME-BENDING DESIGN INSPIRED BY THE SPECULATIVE TECHNOLOGICAL OPTIMISM OF 1970S CONCEPT CARS. 

THREE DISTINCTIVE TRACTION OUTSOLE PATTERNS AND ANGULAR FEATURES ARE EMPLOYED TO GIVE THE FAMILIAR LOW-CUT SLEEKNESS OF THE ERA’S RUNNING SHOES AN AGGRESSIVE, EXPERIMENTAL EDGE. THE XC-72 IS THE FUTURE THAT THE PAST DREAMED ABOUT, COME TO LIFE.

VERTICALLY SPLIT OUTSOLE FEATURES TWO HARD GROUND TRACTION DESIGNS THE XC15’S ‘GRIPPER’ AND THE 375’S STUDDED PATTERN
STABILITY HEEL CLIP FEATURING THE 620S HERRINGBONE OUTSOLE PATTERN
HAIRY SUEDE UPPER WITH RECYCLED CONTENT IN N LOGO, LACE AND LINING. VAMP FEATURES TEXTILE WITH TENCEL™ LYOCELL FIBERS DERIVED FROM RENEWABLE WOOD SOURCES.
SINGLE LAYER MICROFIBER TONGUE
SQUARED TOE SHAPE INSPIRED BY 1970S CONCEPT CAR DESIGNS

THE NEW BALANCE MLT610TBE SHOES IN MINDFUL GREY WITH DRIFTWOOD AND MUSHROOM ARE BUILT TO DELIVER ON VERSATILITY AND COMFORT, WITHOUT COMPROMISING ON STYLE. 

UNDERFOOT SUPPORT IS PROVIDED BY C-CAP MIDSOLE CUSHIONING WHILE THE TREAD IS INSPIRED BY EARLY 2000'S TRAIL RUNNING DESIGNS. SUEDE UPPERS WITH A MESH UNDER LINING FEATURE IN DRIFTWOOD.

ADJUSTABLE LACES RUN ALONG THE FULL LENGTH OF THE SHOE ALLOWING FOR A CUSTOMISED FIT TO INCREASE PERFORMANCE AND COMFORT. 

NEEDLESS TO SAY, THIS IS AN IMPRESSIVE SET OF SHOES...

NEW BALANCE DELVE BACK INTO THE ARCHIVES TO BRING BACK THE NEW BALANCE RAINIER LOW OG IN BROWN PREMIUM LEATHER.

LIKELY THIS HISTORIC HIKING BOOT WILL BE GETTING THE TEDDY SANTIS TREATMENT. AND LIKE THE NB550, IS EXPECTED TO EXPERIENCE A RENAISSANCE IN THE SNEAKER COMMUNITY.


IT FEATURES A CLEAN AND ELEGANT “GLAZED GINGER” LOOK WITH A DARK RED THICK TEXTILE BASE AND BROWN LEATHER OVERLAYS. THE COSY PADDED COLLARS ARE ALSO IN THE SAME RICH COFFEE-COLOURED HUE WHILE THE METAL HARDWARE WITH A RUSTY ACCENT FURTHERS ITS RETRO FEEL.

FINALLY, THIS COMEBACK OF THE NEW BALANCE RAINIER CLOSES WITH A SPRINGY AND GRIPPY VIBRAM® SOLE UNIT. 

WITH US AT URBAN INDUSTRY IN LIMITED NUMBERS, DON'T SLEEP!

THIS IS THE NEW BALANCE ATHLETICS NATURE STATE PULLOVER HOODIE IN GREEN FEATURING A MINIMAL EMBROIDERED NEW BALANCE LOGO ON THE LEFT CHEST.

MADE FROM HEAVYWEIGHT 100% COTTON FRENCH TERRY, WITH AT LEAST 50% OF THOSE FIBRES BEING SOURCED AS ENVIRONMENTALLY PREFERRED, IT'S SOFT, COMFY AND THE PERFECT DAILY PIECE FOR CASUAL STYLE. ITS RELAXED FIT HANGS EASILY ON THE BODY WITH A ROOMIER FIT FOR COMFORT AND EASE.

THE NEW BALANCE RAINIER AC SHOES IN FADED WORKWEAR ARE A STYLISH AND RELIABLE HIKING BOOT, WITH INSPIRATION FROM THE 1982 CLASSIC. THE RAINIER AC SHOES ARE FASHIONABLE AND COMFORTABLE, PERFECT FOR EVERYDAY USE AND OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES.

THE PATAGONIA GO TO SHORT SLEEVE SHIRT IN SUMMER PLANT/WOOL WHITE IS A LIGHT, ULTRA COMFORTABLE SHORT-SLEEVED SHIRT MADE WITH AN EASY-CARE ORGANIC COTTON/RECYCLED POLYESTER FABRIC.

THE 3.2-OZ 60% ORGANIC COTTON/40% RECYCLED POLYESTER PLAIN WEAVE IS WHAT MAKES THE SHIRT THE PERFECT CHOICE FOR THOSE SUMMER DAYS.

CLEAN, TONAL BUTTON-FRONT STYLING AND A LEFT-CHEST POCKET FOR YOUR SUNGLASSES. THE SHIRT BOASTS A BOLD SUMMER PRINT READY TO MAKE A STATEMENT.

THE PATAGONIA WORN WEAR FIELD REPAIR KIT IN BLACK IS PERFECT FOR OUTDOOR ADVENTURERS, OFFERING A PORTABLE WAY TO KEEP APPAREL AND GEAR IN GOOD CONDITION.

IN JUST ONE KIT, YOU’LL GET TWO SEWING NEEDLES, POLYESTER THREAD, AND GEAR AID® REPAIR TAPE TO FIX TEARS AND RIPS WHILE YOU’RE OUT IN THE FIELD. ALL STORED CONVENIENTLY IN ANY WALLET OR BACKPACK.

KEEP YOUR GARMENTS IN TOP CONDITION WITH THE PATAGONIA WORN WEAR REPAIR ROLL IN BLACK.

THIS EASY-TO-CARRY REPAIR KIT INCLUDES TWO SEWING NEEDLES, POWERFUL POLYESTER THREAD, AND GEAR AID® REPAIR TAPE FOR FAST AND RELIABLE FABRIC FIXES.

BE PREPARED FOR ANY REPAIR EMERGENCY AND ENSURE YOUR GEAR IS ADVENTURE READY.

THE NEW BALANCE MT580AB2 SHOES IN WORKWEAR WITH HONEYCOMB AND RAW CASHEW ARE THE CLASSIC SILHOUETTE, REIMAGINED. IN A NATURAL INDIGO COLOURWAY THAT SEEKS TO COMBINE COMFORT AND ELEVATE YOUR STYLE.

SOFT NAVY SUEDE AND MESH OVERLAYS MAKE UP THE UPPERS WITH WHITE PANELLING AND ACCENTS STAYING TRUE TO THOSE CLASSIC DESIGN LINES, WITH A MUTED COLOURWAY. WITH THE ADDITION OF THE ROLLBAR CARBON FIBRE MIDSOLE AND STABILITY POST SYSTEM THAT HELPS TO CONTROL REAR-FOOT MOVEMENT FOR ENHANCED SUPPORT.

WITH A LOW PADDED COLLAR, ABZORB MIDSOLE AND STACKED RUBBER OUTSOLE. THE MT580AB2 ARE A SIMPLISTIC DESIGN WITH GREAT FUNCTIONALITY, SURE TO ELEVATE YOUR FOOTWEAR ROTATION. FEATURING SOME ADDITIONAL BRANDING ACROSS THE TONGUE, SIDE AND REAR OF THE TRAINER.

THE NEW BALANCE 991 SHOES ARE EASILY THE MOST SOUGHT AFTER OF THE COMPANIES 'MADE IN ENGLAND' RANGE.

BOASTING A PIGSKIN SUEDE UPPER WITH VENTILATING MESH PANELS, THIS RETRO RUNNING STYLE IS BUILT IN THE NEW BALANCE FACTORY IN CUMBRIA, UK.

THIS MADE IN ENGLAND CLASSIC SEES THE ABZORB TECHNOLOGY IN THE MIDSOLE THAT KEEPS THE 991 LIGHTWEIGHT WITH MAXIMUM CUSHIONING, ADDING ALL DAY COMFORT WITH MAXIMUM DURABILITY, WHILE THE RUBBER OUTSOLE PROVIDES PLENTY OF GRIP.

NEW BALANCE'S NATURE STATE RANGE WAS INSPIRED BY MINIMALIST DESIGN WITH A HEAVYWEIGHT FRENCH TERRY FABRIC IN A NATURAL COLOUR PALETTE.

THIS IS THE NEW BALANCE ATHLETICS STATE POCKET T-SHIRT IN SAGE LEAF.

ITS HEAVYWEIGHT 100% COTTON FABRIC IS SOFT, COMFORTABLE AND CUT WITH A MODERN RELAXED, SLIGHTLY BOXY FIT THAT DRAPES LOOSELY FROM THE CHEST, WAIST AND HIP.

A SINGLE POCKET SITS ON THE CHEST AND FEATURES AN EMBROIDERED NEW BALANCE LOGO.

NEW BALANCE IS A PROUD MEMBER OF THE BETTER COTTON INITIATIVE. WHEN YOU BUY COTTON PRODUCTS FROM NEW BALANCE, YOU’RE SUPPORTING MORE SUSTAINABLE COTTON FARMING PRACTICES.
